website_summaries.verdict: You'll receive better than expected quality with this unit versus others in the price range.
pros: Standard-size arcade game, which isn't always the case in this low price point
Folds up to save space when not in use
older kids may be too rough with it
cons: Not quite as durable as some others

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because of the price but I’m glad I did because my 6 year old grandson and his daddy are loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Fun and friendship enjoyable time
customer_reviews.text: The basketball game set is as expected, Fun and friendship enjoyable time. It does take me some times to build this, 2 hour maybe, this can be shorten at least 1 hour if you use the real tool( which I had and stupid enough not to use it) instead of the small tool that came with the package. I did not found the needle that required to pump the basketball, but in has the hand-pump. The electron device that is programmed for many games and up to 4 players. Game rack can be lift and upright for storage and transportation. Save lots money to play with friend at home instead of outside. Overall great buy and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: phyto

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor activity
customer_reviews.text: When you need some indoor activity, here it is. I always trade in old games and buy more new games. This one definitely is one of the best ones ever. It also has sound function. With all multi funtion it add om, totlly wothy it.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Its Large but Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to appease my nephews and nieces when they come to visit. It is very large I have space for it, and it doesn't move around easily when in use (because of its size). It seems to be very sturdy and durable. I mean it has survived about 10 1-2 hour sessions with 5-10 year olds, so if it can survive them then it should last for years. I am very happy with my purchase and am sure that any will appreciate this game, just be aware that it is large.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Vu

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Really great item. Literally hours of fun for all ages . I bought this for my daughter‘s 10th birthday and everyone that comes to the house please at least three or four rounds on it because it’s so much fun . It took me about three hours to put it together by myself which is not bad at all I think . definitely worth every penny if you follow the instructions and do it right . Thanks Giantex and amazon for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Lynn Forever

customer_reviews.title: It needs weight on the bottom to keep it still.
customer_reviews.text: Took a little longer than I thought to set it up, the users manual little confusing but thankfully I had it all figured out. Kids love to play with it after school good out door activities.
customer_reviews.author: Stop shopping here!

customer_reviews.title: This game is fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This game is a fun for everyone and it is built well enough to last through all 7 of my grandkids playing it all summer! Dont let the low cost scare you, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: andrea h

customer_reviews.title: Boys
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves it. It’s a pretty big size for indoors But we live in an apartment
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with one of the hoops being bent... Customer service took care of me.. This is an excellent game, kids play with it all the time and it makes for fun family nights
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Really nice unit, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Grad Night at high school and it survived a night of much use. The backboard did crack a little but doesn't affect the game. Really nice unit, good quality. Would like to replace backboard but haven't found any information on seller or how to contact. Will enjoy for many years!
customer_reviews.author: LuckyLego

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap, sometimes the thing that counts points misses a shot or counts a shot that never went in, but... It is legit. Worth the $. Id easily and painlessly buy 3 of these to buying 1 of the others that sell for 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: UPS GUY

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was kind of a pain to put together but my son and all of his friends love it. Much larger than we expected even though we had measured the space for it, but when balls are flying, make sure you have enough overhead room. The basket counter works great, unlike reviews of some other brands/models. Balls are great quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: amelialocks

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a little Dave m busters right at home love ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a little Dave m busters right at home love it. It’s pretty big and for 5”9 I don’t have to bend down to shoot the ball the balls are real little basketballs. I must say the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basketball game for kids. My 10-yr-old loves it and plays all the time. Great for when other kids come over, too. Construction is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: jnorton24

customer_reviews.title: I was really happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with this,it's really big,wouldn't fit in basement cause low ceiling. But that's ok,have in playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Todd

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! I got for my friend's son and he loves it. It's really big and filled the whole room, but he loves it and that's all that matters! :)
customer_reviews.author: Fife Dali

customer_reviews.title: Great gift as far as keeping the kids off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gift as far as keeping the kids off the electronics for a short while but as far as quality merchandise. Not only was this a bear to put together but we have only had it few months and it's already falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: satisfied

customer_reviews.title: We like this game
customer_reviews.text: We like this game, the only thing is its too low. I am 6'1 and I can basically look over in the hoops. I am going to make some adjusts to it and raise it up some and it will be perfect. The kiddo's and rest of family love it.
customer_reviews.author: cmayfld89Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: First of all... this thing is huge. Look at how much space it took up. My husband just opened it today for xmas. This is a picture of them putting it together. The net keeps getting stuck on the black thing that keeps score. And if you look where I circled on the bottom right corner that bottom part is lopsided and won't stand properly. Not worth the $100 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer does not respond to problems.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great idea for my grandsons and they loved it! But within four months the scoring and all electrical stopped working. I checked all of the cords and replaced the batteries and nothing is broken. But it won’t work. Tried contacting the manufacturer but got absolutely zero response. I would not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Klump

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival one of the legs was bent, probably during shipping. We were able to put it together no problem. When I posted information about the bend, the seller provided a credit. That was great. My son loves it!! He plays is all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gelthaus

customer_reviews.title: No way to contact company
customer_reviews.text: We love this game and my kids have had tons of fun playing with it. If i was only rating for the item itself I would give it 5 stars. However there is no contact information to contact the company to purchase replacement parts. There is a plastic piece that sticks out into the hoop to count shots which my son accidentally broke and we cannot get a replacement for it so the game has become useless because you can’t count your shots.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: We are one happy family!!
customer_reviews.text: We are 100% happy and love our new 2 player basketball game !! Man o man am I glad I decided to go with this one it is VERY sturdy and works perfect !! It has been amazing especially during this whole COVID nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Breeyan

customer_reviews.title: Dont wast your money
customer_reviews.text: Lots of missing parts, but didn't know until I had already assembled most of it and could not finish bc of missing bars. Lots of assembling, need 2 people to build. It's very tall as well. Not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather opperman

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: The worst thing I ever bought on amazon! So hard to assemble and the quality is so bad and now in order to get out of the room to put it in the garbage I have to disassemble 😱😱😱 save your money
customer_reviews.author: Jmjha

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: My son is having fun playing but man was it a pain. Parts where missing (bolts). I had to go to the store to get the missing parts, the bar that is supposed to be threaded through the fabric did not fit so I had to improvise and once it was all put together it doesn’t sit flat on one side. Other than that it’s been fun. The black score keeping thing does get stuck on the net a lot but usually comes of when throwing the balls in the net.
customer_reviews.author: Christene Geller

customer_reviews.title: Scorings and sounds
customer_reviews.text: My just turned 8 grandson and friends really into this arcade style game. It took a while to put together but that’s to be expected. I gave it 4 stars because we haven’t been able to get the second player side to react with the realistic scoring or sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Okie Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My two boys are pretty tough with it. But it is definitely holding it's own. It's sturdy and has a lot more features than I was expecting. :) Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karri

customer_reviews.title: Scoreboard was defective, but they gave me a full ...
customer_reviews.text: Scoreboard was defective,but they gave me a full refund, and kept the item, so, i have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for kids & adults together
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson for his 5th birthday & he loves it! We all are having fun with it. Awesome item an very reasonable for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!  Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: After almost two months since I got this product, I want to leave it a review. Very nice and valuable product! Now my families play it every weekend as families competition - great fun! It is easy to install, and we set it up within an hour. It did take us some effort to fight out how the control works. So far, it still works fine. Great product for family time!
customer_reviews.author: ally

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The baskeball hoop is nice. The 3 stars are for how hard it is to assemble. It was not easy at all and whoever wrote the instructions needs to be fired.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA

customer_reviews.title: Parts made on a Friday at quittin’ time
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet. Have to drill holes in the #2 bar because they are on the wrong side . The bars don’t match each other. We will see how the rest goes.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Except the balls keep getting caught in the net. Because of the plastic counter getting tangled in the net
customer_reviews.author: LondonRose

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. The backboard arrived cracked as other reviewers ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. The backboard arrived cracked as other reviewers mentioned. NONE of the nuts tighten up, and the backplate of one of the rims is bent and won't lie flat against the backboard.
customer_reviews.author: Wafflefrogs

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, one small flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great fun! Took about two hours to assemble. Kids and adults love it. Only. Problem is that the net keeps getting stuck with therefore the balls get stuck. We are almost thinking about taking the night off.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kate Shea

customer_reviews.title: Great but catch net is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It is a lot of fun and my sons love it. I am just upset with how easy the net is ripping. After only one use the fabric is ripping already.
customer_reviews.author: Candis Shivers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality. Only negative I've seen is the net get hung up on the counter every time and hangs up balls. Have to cut net some to prevent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Book

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product weld broke after 4 weeks of use. Still useable just crooked. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Bad parts
customer_reviews.text: I think I got the wrong parts because 5 days later and I still can’t seen to put it together. The openings in the poles are in the wrong places 😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: The picture is BIGGER
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt as tall as it appears in the picture but I should've read that before I ordered it. I recommend for ages 5-13 years of age only
customer_reviews.author: LadyPynk

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it. Electronics never worked but the company gave ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. Electronics never worked but the company gave us a refund. In the end a good value for kids entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson really likes it I bought it for him for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My grandson really likes it I bought it for him for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for I guess?? - Screws don't go completely in. - Screws pop out when shooting - Real garbage product Disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, Fun
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this and it’s a hit when company comes over! Good quality hoops!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won't be sorry!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun and works perfectly.... but the backboard came a little damaged so we were a tad disappointed about that. Had it arrived in perfect condition I would have given it 5 stars!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect. my grand son loves it. He plays all day none stop.
customer_reviews.author: Afghani

customer_reviews.title: I will not buy it again or recommend anyone to buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing was broken when I got it, I will not buy it again or recommend anyone to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Tonie Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Pain to put together but they like
customer_reviews.text: Kids use every day. Pain to put together but they like it
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages, even my mother.. :)
customer_reviews.text: It fit so well in my townhouse. And its actually not as loud as I was thinking. Perfect for family get-togethers and play dates. Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: AmyFixerUpper&Fun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fun!
customer_reviews.text: It came with everything you'll need to set it up & me and my son both love it!! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Staphne Hill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great indoor activity for cold and long winter weekends for little boys
customer_reviews.author: sevim arslan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is cheap but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: Risky purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun and all but one of the score things that go under the net doesn’t even work... like wtf?!?! Am I doing something wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids. They loved it. Price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this game for over six months and it has exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: mark harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game for the price point I just wish the framing was heavier.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnnZurowski

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT EVEN WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY CHEAP QUALITY AND POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE. Net tore within one hour of play and when I requested a replacement Giantex told me to sew it. Definitely not worth the money if it doesn’t even last 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality item made very cheaply. Very difficult to put together and must have 2 people to assemble. Scoreboard was cracked when it arrived. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great indoor entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Good material, seems quite strong and should be able to take kids of all ages and adults playing. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Singh

product_meta.title: Giantex Foldable Basketball Arcade Game, 8 Game Options, Electronic Double Shot 2 Player w/ 4 Balls and LED Scoring System, Indoor Basketball Game for Kids, Adults
feature_bullets: 🏀 8 Game Options for Multiple Interaction: There are 8 game options can be selected by setting the controller at your hand. And you will find the detailed description of endless ways of play in the manual.

🏀 2 Basketball Hoops and 4 Free Basketballs: The dual shooting system with 2 big 12" in diameter iron basketball hoops ensures a multiple player interaction. And there are 4 premium rubber basketballs included for instant fun when receiving the machine.

🏀 Digital Score Shows and Arcade Sounds: With an infrared optical sensored scoring system, it shows real-time scores accurately. Along with the arcade sounds, it creates an exciting and competitive atmosphere, giving you a real arcade game experience.

🏀 Foldable and Durable Iron Construction: After folding, this sturdy iron basketball arcade machine saves space close to 50%, making it easier for storage. And this powder coated iron tube made machine is able to withstand continual use for years.

🏀 Quality MDF Backboard and Blocking Net: Using quality MDF board do of the backboard, it gives the basketball a good rebound base, making the shot more realistic. And the blocking nets on both sides help to prevent the balls from flying out, saving you time from picking up.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
